content: Hi! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I can help set up an appointment for HVAC, plumbing, or electrical work. Could I please have your name to get started?
Nice to meet you, Mark! What address would you like us to come to for your service?
Actually, I think I’m going to pass on scheduling. I’m moving out soon, so I’d rather not put more into this place. Thanks anyway!
reason: Customer is moving soon and does not want to invest in repairs.

content: Got it, Mark! Best of luck with your move. If you ever need help in your new place, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
reason: Customer is moving soon and does not want to invest in repairs.
